enchantment.flamesenchants.advanced_aqua: An advanced version of Aqua Affinity
enchantment.flamesenchants.supreme_aqua_: The highest tier of Aqua Affinity
enchantment.flamesenchants.advanced_bane: An advanced version of Bane of Anthropods
enchantment.flamesenchants.advanced_blas: An advanced version of Blast Protection
enchantment.flamesenchants.advanced_dept: An advanced version of Depth Strider
enchantment.flamesenchants.supreme_depth: The highest tier of Depth Strider
enchantment.flamesenchants.advanced_fire: An advanced version of Fire Aspect
enchantment.flamesenchants.supreme_fire_: The highest tier of Fire Aspect
enchantment.flamesenchants.advanced_fire: An advanced version of Fire Protection
enchantment.flamesenchants.advanced_fros: An advanced version of Frost Walker
enchantment.flamesenchants.supreme_frost: The highest tier of Frost Walker
enchantment.flamesenchants.advanced_luck: An advanced version of Luck of the Sea
enchantment.flamesenchants.supreme_luck_: The highest tier of Luck of the Sea
enchantment.flamesenchants.advanced_proj: An advanced version of Projectile Protection
enchantment.flamesenchants.advanced_quic: An advanced version of Quick Charge
enchantment.flamesenchants.supreme_quick: The highest tier of Quick Charge
enchantment.flamesenchants.advanced_soul: An advanced version of Soul Speed
enchantment.flamesenchants.supreme_soul_: The highest tier of Soul Speed
enchantment.flamesenchants.advanced_swee: An advanced version of Sweeping Edge
enchantment.flamesenchants.supreme_sweep: The highest tier of Sweeping Edge
enchantment.flamesenchants.adept.desc: Multiplies XP drops. Multiple is decreased when target is a boss.
enchantment.flamesenchants.rune_arrow_pi: Will cause fired arrows to pierce through enemy armor at +25% per level
enchantment.flamesenchants.ash_destroyer: Deals extra damage if the target is on fire
enchantment.flamesenchants.atomic_decons: Will give a small chance for your first hit to be a one-hit kill
Deals extra damage to undead and heals the player for damage dealt
enchantment.flamesenchants.brutality.des: Damage dealt to enemy armor is increased
enchantment.flamesenchants.burning_thorn: When attacked, deals damage back to attacker and ignites the attacker
enchantment.flamesenchants.butchering.de: Deals extra damage to animals (1.25 + 1.25 * Level)
enchantment.flamesenchants.clear_skies_f: Deals extra damage if the weather is clear and lesser if rainy
enchantment.flamesenchants.critical_stri: Will give a chance to deal extra damage based on your attack damage
enchantment.flamesenchants.culling.desc: When attacking using an axe, if the enemy has low HP, attack will give the player Jump Boost and allows for a critical hit on descent. If successful, the mob will drop its head. If failed, the attack will simply be a critical strike. Using this enchantment drains hunger quickly
enchantment.flamesenchants.curse_of_deca: Causes a dropped item to despawn within seconds
enchantment.flamesenchants.curse_of_inac: Attacks with a melee weapon will miss and attacks with a bow will be inaccurate
enchantment.flamesenchants.curse_of_poss: Item cannot be dropped (Disappears when dragged and dropped but can be put into a chest) (Item also disappears on death)
enchantment.flamesenchants.cursed_edge.d: Deals extra damage to enemies, but deals damage to player for a percentage of damage dealt
Attacks deal extra damage if both player and enemy are in a dark area. At level three, enchant applies blindness on hit (0.75 * Level)
enchantment.flamesenchants.disarmament.d: Attacks have a chance to apply disorientation to target
enchantment.flamesenchants.envenomed.des: Attacks apply poison and wither if target is applicable
enchantment.flamesenchants.evasion.desc: Grants the player a chance to evade attacks and dodge out of the way
enchantment.flamesenchants.flinging.desc: Similar to Knockback except attacks launch enemies upward instead of back
enchantment.flamesenchants.inner_berserk: Increases damage deal when players health is lower
enchantment.flamesenchants.instability.d: The lower the durability of the weapon, the more damage it deals, however, damage taken by the tool is equal to damage dealt
enchantment.flamesenchants.life_steal.de: Heals you based on damage dealt
enchantment.flamesenchants.natural_block: When wearing a shield, the shield will naturally block a percentage of damage naturally taken by the player (20% damage reduction for level 1 and 30% for level 2, calculated before armor and protection enchantments)
enchantment.flamesenchants.parry.desc: Attacks from enemies have a chance to be parried and they will be knocked back
enchantment.flamesenchants.penetrating_e: Enemies with more armor will take more damage
enchantment.flamesenchants.rains_bestowm: Deals extra damage if the weather is rainy and lesser if clear
enchantment.flamesenchants.reviled_blade: Damage increases the lower the enemies health is
enchantment.flamesenchants.spell_breaker: Deals extra damage to "magic" enemies (i.e. Witches, Evokers and Illusioners)
enchantment.flamesenchants.strengthened_: Increases your health depending on current Maximum Health
enchantment.flamesenchants.subject_engli: Does extra damage to "smart mobs" (i.e Iron Golems, Wolves, Villagers, Snow Golems, Witches and Zombie Pigmen) (all subject enchantments do 0.8 + 0.3(level) damage as sharpness. English does an additional 3 points per level to smart mobs, witches, vindicators etc, up to 12)
enchantment.flamesenchants.subject_pe.de: Does damage like Sharpness but also has a chance to give you buffs such as Speed, Resistance and Haste for a short time (level affects types of buffs and maximum potency recieved in combat; level I offers haste and speed I while level V offers regen IV, speed IV, haste IV, resistance III, strength II and jump boost V for a short time)
enchantment.flamesenchants.unpredictable: Makes damage dealt unpredictable from negative to positive. Negative damage will heal the enemy. Damage is randomized based on current damage level
enchantment.flamesenchants.upgraded_pote: Reduces XP cost in anvil when enchanting (resets anvil use count for item, always costs 10 levels, can be used once per item but also on books)
Attacks deal bonus damage to Blaze, Endermen, Magma Cubes and enemies that are submerged in water. Damage stacks if target meets requirements (2.5 * Level)
